p: At the end of the 2 months induction period, the HFD group was randomly sorted into two subsets. The NFD group and the first HFD subset received 1 mL 0.9% saline by gavage daily for 2 weeks, whilst the second HFD subset (HFD+GbE) was orally gavaged with GbE 500 mg/kg, as previously described ( 31).
